meanings.sent1: The emmets were busy carrying food to their nest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a trail of emmets marching in a straight line.
meanings.sent3: The emmets had a picnic with tiny crumbs of bread.
meanings.sent4: The emmets worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The emmets scurried around like miniature soldiers on a mission.

meanings.sent1: A large emmets gathered around a fallen crumb.
meanings.sent2: The emmets moved as a unified force towards the sugary treat.
meanings.sent3: The emmets held a meeting to discuss their next food source.
meanings.sent4: The emmets resembled a bustling city with their organized movements.
meanings.sent5: The emmets formed a living carpet on the forest floor.
